creator: carnold@apache.org
text:
The log4j 1.2.x unit tests fail on later JDK's and versions of Ant since the witness files contained stack 
traces containing levels within the JDK and Ant implementation.  The bug ports over the SunReflectFilter 
and JunitTestRunnerFilter from log4j 1.3.x which strip off some internal JDK and Ant entries from the call 
stack.
Also appears to occur with JDK 1.2 and earlier.
creator: carnold@apache.org
carnold@apache.org
text: Modified to accept all stack formats from JDK 1.1 to 1.5.
